name: Super Slyder
summary: Direct an adorable ball named Slyder through a thrilling set of mazes. You guessed it... the blue lovable hero is back with an all-new addictive adventure containing level-altering items, 9 unique characters, and hilarious animations. This new slippery version also comes with 280+ challenging levels and an easy-to-use level editor. Play the levels at your own pace with level-skipping ability. Let the stress fall away as you slide into this fun adventure!
